data.title: Day Red Rock Climbing Experience
data.meta_description: Less than an hour’s drive from downtown Las Vegas, splendid multi-­hued sandstone crags, beautiful canyons, and lofty summits provide an ideal environment for your climbing experience. We are pleased to offer a full range of guiding services in the Red Rock, from easy and enjoyable single-pitch climbs to the most challenging multi­-day big wall ascents, […]
data.text:
This is a full-day of climbing, whether a series of short routes or a moderately long, 4-6pitch climbs that can be completed in eight hours or less. Routes are chosen based on your ability and goals. Prior climbing experience or prerequisite classes is required.

Start early, climb high and end late! Routes climbed will be of a more challenging nature, typically 7-10 pitches in length. Your guide will evaluate your experience and suggest routes appropriate to meet your goals. Prior climbing experience or prerequisite classes is required.

Grade IV+ and Grade V climbs. Routes like Epinephrine, Mt. Wilson, and the Rainbow Wall. Experienced climbers only.

Family vacations – you know how difficult it is to please everyone, but The Mountain Guides has a solution. Spend the day, weekend or week soaking up the sunshine in the beautiful Red Rock Canyon on a rock climbing family adventure.

Our guides will coordinate the ideal rock climbing experience based on your family’s ability level and prior training. Previous family clients have found rock climbing to be a great way to improve communication and create trust between members.

Children as young as five have had great experiences in our basic climbing classes. Parents/guardians should accompany children up to the age of ten.

In today’s competitive marketplace, a strong management/employee team is key to success. A day of rock climbing is a fun and creative way to help jumpstart your team’s performance. By building self-confidence, developing creative problem solving skills and cultivating trust between your team members, The Mountain Guides can tailor your Corporate Climbing session is to meet your organization’s specific needs. During your next sales meeting or trade conference in Las Vegas, call TMG to schedule your company’s session.

Previous rock climbing experience is not necessary. In fact, our clients discover employees with no climbing experience become so motivated they feel they can take on the world!

An inspiring day set in the beautiful sandstone canyons of Red Rocks, your team will learn skills to succeed in every aspect of life. Challenged by climbing a variety of routes, participants will exercise problem-solving skills, understand the importance of strong communication skills, calculate risk and make decisions with confidence and learn to trust their belayer while being encouraged by their peers. Please call for prices and details.

Rock climbing is a great challenge and confidence builder for individuals and groups. Perfect for scout programs, youth groups, women’s clubs and senior groups, climbing is great cross training for other sports such as gymnastics and soccer. The Mountain Guides (TMG) coordinates programs that are full of fun and adventure, teaching valuable communication, trust and decision-making skills while offering a great workout for people of all ages and ability levels.

We can model your program after one our Classes or Camps, with special consideration for your group’s needs. With nearly forty years of experience in rock climbing instruction and guiding, TMG has the expertise to design the ideal single or multi-day program for your group. Call us anytime for details and pricing information for private groups/clubs.

This is a great option for those that haven’t done a multi pitch climb and are eager to learn or for those that would like to sample our world class sport climbing and multi pitch climbing in the same day!

Come enjoy a full day in the beautiful weather of the Mojave desert. You will get to sample some of the hyper classic single pitch routes the Red Rock has to offer. All of our trips also involve plenty of instruction on safety systems, movement, and technical skills. This trip is a perfect fit for those that have limited outdoor climbing experience or those looking to push the grade.
